description: Reprinted with publisher permission from LEON Fast Vegan by Rebecca Seal, Chantal Symons, and John Vincent; Octopus Publishing.
name: Spanish Chickpea Stew
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon each of ground cumin ( sweet smoked paprika and fennel seeds)
1 1/4 cups vegan vegetable broth or 1 tablespoon vegan vegetable bouillon powder and 1 1/4 cups water

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat. When hot, add the onions, garlic, and vegetables and sweat, stirring frequently, for 15 minutes, until they begin to caramelize.

Add the dried spices, fennel seeds, saffron, and pepper and cook for 3 minutes. Stir well, then add the vinegar and orange juice. Cook for 1 minute, then add the chickpeas, orange zest, and broth or bouillon powder and water and bring to a simmer.

Reduce the heat to low, cover, and cook for 45 minutes, stirring occasionally to prevent it from sticking. Season with a little salt to taste; you may not need it if using bouillon powder, because itâ€™s salty. Stir through 2 tablespoons of the parsley, then serve sprinkled with the remaining parsley and with orange wedges to squeeze over it.
